task_name: 他の物理定数（alpha_em 等）への幾何学的拡張性の検討

data_sources.description: SSoT constants (alpha_em_0, pi, k_mapping_coefficients) and topology assignments

computed_values.topological_meaning: Saturation level k=18 (Top/Z) scaled by 24-fold symmetry and projected via pi.

notes: Fundamental expansion of topological quantization. The relation 1/alpha_em_0 = 432/pi connects the Standard Model saturation level (k=18) to the Leech lattice symmetry (24) with extreme precision.
